record.dc:title: AMG31(B) Hiwassee Island Sites 37MG31, 38MG31, VT1MG31, 39MG31, 40MG31, 41MG31, 42MG31, 43MG31, 44MG31, 45MG31, 46MG31, 47MG31, 48MG31, 49MG31, 50MG31, 51MG31, 52MG31, 53MG31, 63MG31, 78MG31, 95MG31, and 190MG31, Meigs County, Tennessee. General, the camp.
